channel.title: sucrose on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in sucrose on funPlantGenes

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: BrOG1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA08002322 Gene Symbol: BrOG1A Gene Name: Orphan gene 1 Genome: B.

item.title: BrOG1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraSca000221 Gene Symbol: BrOG1B Gene Name: Orphan gene 2 Genome: B.

item.title: CitAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitAMT1 Gene Name: ammonium transporter1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis x Poncirus trifoliata Functional Descriptions: Ammonium transport and CitAMT1 expression are regulated by N in Citrus plants.

item.title: CitSUS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSUS5 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 5 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSWEET6 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 6 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitZAT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitZAT5 Gene Name: ZINC FINGER OF ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CitZAT5 modifies sugar accumulation and hexose proportion in citrus fruit.

item.title: ClINV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C10G201810 Gene Symbol: ClINV Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Transcriptome analysis showed that the invertase gene ClINV was the only gene involved in sucrose metabolism that was upregulated in mutant flesh.

item.title: ClNAC68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G059250 Gene Symbol: ClNAC68 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor ClNAC68 positively regulates sugar content and seed development in watermelon by repressing ClINV and ClGH3.

item.title: ClSnRK2.3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G038540 Gene Symbol: ClSnRK2.3 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClSnRK2.

item.title: ClVST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G031010 Gene Symbol: ClVST1 Gene Name: vacuolar sugar transporter Genome: watermelon genome database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Report a novel vacuolar sugar transporter (ClVST1) identified through map-based cloning and association study, whose expression in fruit phloem is associated with accumulation of sucrose (Suc) in watermelon fruit.

item.title: CmERFI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C002624 Gene Symbol: CmERFI-2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor I-2 Genome: melon genome database (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: CmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFTL2 Gene Name: flowering locus T-like 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmFTL2 is involved in the photoperiod- and sucrose-mediated control of flowering time in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmMYB44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C016789 Gene Symbol: CmMYB44 Gene Name: MYB44 transcription factor Genome: Melon (DHL92) v3.

item.title: CmTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmTST2 Gene Name: tonoplast sugar transporter2 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the tonoplast sugar transporter CmTST2 in melon fruit increases sugar accumulation.

item.title: CsSTS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS1 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSTS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS2 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSTS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS3 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSUS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUS3 Gene Name: Sucrose Synthase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Antisense expression of CsSUS3 clearly reduced cucumber tolerance to hypoxic stress induced by flooding.

item.title: CsSUS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa5G322500 Gene Symbol: CsSUS4 Gene Name: Sucrose Synthase 4 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-Regulating Cucumber Sucrose Synthase 4 (CsSUS4) Suppresses the Growth and Development of Flowers and Fruits.

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGAMYB Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: Central role of FaGAMYB in the transition of the strawberry receptacle from development to ripening.

item.title: GhCPK84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D10G2029 Gene Symbol: GhCPK84 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhCPK93
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2743 Gene Symbol: GhCPK93 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/GhCPK93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhSUS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G1309 Gene Symbol: GhSUS2 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Comparative phosphoproteomic analysis reveals that phosphorylation of sucrose synthase GhSUS2 by Ca2+-dependent protein kinases GhCPK84/93 affects cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhSWEET10D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G1898 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET10D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GmHSP17.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17G045800 Gene Symbol: GmHSP17.9 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A small heat shock protein, GmHSP17.

item.title: GmNOD100;GmSS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G114000 Gene Symbol: GmNOD100 GmSS1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNOD100, a sucrose synthase in soybean nodules which was also preferentially expressed in the infected zone of nodules, similar to GmHSP17.

item.title: GmSWEET10b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G183500 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET10b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Simultaneous changes in seed size, oil content and protein content driven by selection of SWEET homologues during soybean domestication.

item.title: GmSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G198600 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET6 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSWEET6, was functionally characterised in soybean, and its role in AM symbiosis was investigated via transgenic plants.

item.title: GmWNK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmWNK1 Gene Name: WNK kinase homolog1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean root-specific protein kinase GmWNK1 regulates stress-responsive ABA signaling on the root system architecture.

item.title: HbSUT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbSUT3 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 3 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: HbSUT3 encodes a functional sucrose transporter that exhibits high sucrose affinity with a Km value of 1.

item.title: HvSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G075200.3 Gene Symbol: HvSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the sucrose transporters HvSUT1 and HvSUT2 affects sucrose homeostasis along its delivery path in barley grains.

item.title: HvSUT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU5Hr1G000010.1 Gene Symbol: HvSUT2 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 2 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the sucrose transporters HvSUT1 and HvSUT2 affects sucrose homeostasis along its delivery path in barley grains.

item.title: HvSWEET11b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G054710 Gene Symbol: HvSWEET11b Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 11 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: A radiotracer assay revealed that expressing HvSWEET11b in African clawed frog (Xenopus laevis) oocytes facilitated the bidirectional transfer of not only just sucrose and glucose, but also cytokinin.

item.title: IbSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbSnRK1 Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting-1-related protein kinase-1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: These findings indicate that IbSnRK1 improves starch content and quality through systematical up-regulation of the genes and the increase in key enzyme activities involved in starch biosynthesis pathway in transgenic sweet potato.

item.title: INVAN6;Mei025
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb230860 Gene Symbol: INVAN6 Mei025 Gene Name: INVERTASE ALKALINE NEUTRAL 6 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: LeSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transport protein 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Sucrose transporter LeSUT1 and LeSUT2 inhibition affects tomato fruit development in different ways.

item.title: SbSAI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSAI-2 Gene Name: soluble acid invertase 2 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: The sorghum soluble acid invertase gene SbSAI-2 was cloned and the function verified in Pichia pastoris and rice, showing the SbSAI-2 affects composition and content of sugar in stem juice.

item.title: ShSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ShSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Saccharum hybrid Functional Descriptions: Here we present a functional analysis of the SUT ShSUT1 from sugarcane, an important crop species grown for its ability to accumulate high amounts of sucrose in the stem.

item.title: SlARF10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g069500 Gene Symbol: SlARF10 Gene Name: auxin response factor 10 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlARF10, an auxin response factor, is involved in chlorophyll and sugar accumulation during tomato fruit development.

item.title: SlSUS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlSUS4 Gene Name: sucrose synthase isoform 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Comparison of a novel tomato sucrose synthase, SlSUS4, with previously described SlSUS isoforms reveals distinct sequence features and differential expression patterns in association with stem maturation.

item.title: SlSWEET15

item.title: StPP2Ac2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StPP2Ac2b Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunit Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The protein phosphatase 2A catalytic subunit StPP2Ac2b is involved in the control of potato tuber sprouting and source–sink balance in tubers and sprouts.

item.title: StSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transport protein1 Genome: Species: Solanaceae tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The Potato Sucrose Transporter StSUT1 Interacts with a DRM-Associated Protein Disulfide Isomerase.

item.title: SWEET12c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g024260 Gene Symbol: SWEET12c Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Further analyses suggested that HY5 represses the accumulation of sugar in tomato fruit by activating Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter (SWEET12c) expression.
